<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs=""
>
[Skull Bomb](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1607)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Clockwork" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=331" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun](/Sources.aspx?ID=125) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 80 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand (see text)

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This device is a human-sized skull crafted entirely from metal plating and clockwork gears, which slots easily into a human [skeleton](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=92) in the spot where an ordinary skull would normally be located. While performing a [_create undead_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=10) ritual, you can attach this skull bomb to the target creature in place of its own head. In order to do so, the target creature must be Medium and have the [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) trait. The target creature can have only one skull bomb attached in this fashion. The creature gains the following ability.

 **Throw Skull** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) The creature detaches its skull bomb and hurls the volatile explosive at a point within 30 feet. The skull explodes, dealing 7d6 fire damage to creatures within a 15-foot burst (DC 24 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The skull is permanently destroyed and can't be used again, and the throwing creature is permanently [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) and headless.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
